MonksCommonDisplay.display-players.name: Common Display Players
MonksCommonDisplay.display-players.hint: Player names that are set to be common display
MonksCommonDisplay.show-combat.name: Show Combat
MonksCommonDisplay.show-combat.hint: Show the combat display when a combat starts, and hide it when it ends
MonksCommonDisplay.mirror-movement.name: Mirror Movement
MonksCommonDisplay.mirror-movement.hint: Mirror scale and position of the GM's screen on the common display
MonksCommonDisplay.mirror-token-selectio: Mirror token selection of the GM's screen on the common display (if owned)
MonksCommonDisplay.show-mirror-tool.name: Show Mirror Tool
MonksCommonDisplay.show-mirror-tool.hint: Show the mirror tool with the token tools
MonksCommonDisplay.show-chat-log.name: Show Chat log
MonksCommonDisplay.show-chat-log.hint: Show the side menu with the chat log displayed.
MonksCommonDisplay.show-camera-views.hin: Show the web camera views when video integration is enabled.
MonksCommonDisplay.allow-gm-players.name: Allow GM Players
MonksCommonDisplay.allow-gm-players.hint: Allow GM Players to be shown in the Common Display list
MonksCommonDisplay.show-combatants.name: Show all combatants
MonksCommonDisplay.show-combatants.hint: Instead of just showing the active combatant, show the entire list
MonksCommonDisplay.limit-shown.name: Limit shown combatants
MonksCommonDisplay.combat-scale.name: Combat Scale
MonksCommonDisplay.combat-scale.hint: Scale the size of the combat UI smaller or larger
MonksCommonDisplay.close-after.name: Auto close popouts
MonksCommonDisplay.close-after.hint: Automatically close any windows that are popped out after (seconds)
MonksCommonDisplay.per-scene.name: Setting per scene
MonksCommonDisplay.per-scene.hint: Store the settings per scene so each scene can have different display
MonksCommonDisplay.hide-ui.name: Hide UI
MonksCommonDisplay.hide-ui.hint: Hide the UI for the common display
MonksCommonDisplay.focus-padding.name: Focus Padding
MonksCommonDisplay.show-vertical.name: Show Vertical
MonksCommonDisplay.display.name: Display
MonksCommonDisplay.display.hint: Use this player as a common display
MonksCommonDisplay.mirror.name: Mirror Screen
MonksCommonDisplay.mirror.hint: This player is capable of mirroring the screen
MonksCommonDisplay.selection.name: Mirror Selection
MonksCommonDisplay.selection.hint: This player is capable of mirroring the token selection
MonksCommonDisplay.clear.name: Clear
MonksCommonDisplay.clear.hint: Clear all open windows for this player
